name: entropic
description: A new package registry with a new CLI, designed to be easy to stand up inside your network.
author: C J Silverio <ceejceej@gmail.com>

scripts.lint: npm run lint-registry && npm run lint-cli && npm run lint-md
scripts.postinstall: for d in cli services/registry services/workers services/common/boltzmann; do cd $d; npm i; cd -; done
scripts.test: for d in cli services/registry; do cd $d; npm t; cd -; done
